hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cp -r /var/jenkins_home/jobs src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/logs src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/nodes src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/plugins src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/secrets src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/updates src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/userContent src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/users src/ cp -r /var/jenkins_home/workflow-libs src/
git config user.email "jenkins@kube.com" git config user.name "Jenkins"
git add -A git commit -m "Jenkins update ${JOB_NAME}-${BUILD_NUMBER}" git push
